title: Funnelish Funnel Builder / Copywriter
job_overview:
We're looking for an experienced Funnelish funnel builder / copywriter that has experience in the health & beauty niche building:

- Advertorials
- Listicles
- Product pages
- Quiz funnels
- Checkout pages

What we're looking for:
- At least 1 year experience working with Funnelish
- Good portfolio with verifiable work, we know 95% of Funnelish sellers and can confirm with the owners of the brands if you made the funnel or not.
- Fluent in English (speaking and writing) - add cheese in your response title
- Able to work independently and communicate with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers

What we offer:
- Good salary above market salary
- Room for growth to manager positions
- Working in a team of 20+ hard working people

Respond to this with your portfolio with verifiable funnels created for brands, all auto responses will be marked as spam to Onlinejobs.
